definitions.title: n.pr.m. Aram
definitions.body: (As. Aramu, etc., v. Dl:Pa 257; Thes al prop. √ [[ארם]] = [[רום]] but cf. Nö as below)—
a descendant of Asher 1Ch 7:34.—Elsewhere only of Aramæan people & land (=

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: people, sg. coll. = the Aramoeans, a leading branch of the Shemitic stock inhabiting Mesopotamia & northern Syria, in many tribes & settlements; 2Sa 8:5, 2Sa 8:5, 2Sa 8:6 + 1Ki 20:20, 1Ki 20:21 + 1Ch 19:10, 1Ch 19:12 + (64 t. S K Ch) Am 9:7, Is 7:2, Is 7:4, Is 7:5, Is 7:8, Is 9:11, Is 17:3, Je 35:11; so Ez Eze 16:57, Eze 27:16, but Co in both [[אדום]] [[עַם אֲרָם]] Am 1:5; of particular divisions of Aram, [[בית רְחוֹב]] ´[[א]] 2Sa 10:6, [[חוֹבָא]] ´[[א]] 2Sa 10:6, 2Sa 10:8, Ps 60:2 (title), [[דַּמֶּשֶׂק]] ´[[א]] 2Sa 8:5 cf. 1Ch 18:5, even [[נַהֲרַיִם]] ´[[א]] Ps 60:2 (title); (note that As. never gives name Aramu to people W. of Euphrates, but Chatti instead, with other particular names, COT Ge 10:22, also Dl:l.c.); on 2Sa 8:12, 2Sa 8:13, 1Ch 18:11 v. [[אֱדוֹם]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: less often clearly of land, Aram Nu 23:7, 2Sa 15:8 + 2Ch 20:2 (rd. however here [[אדום]] Thes Add al.), ´[[שְׂדֵה א]] Ho 12:13; also of particular divisions of the territory [[נַהֲרַיִם]] ´[[א]] ‘Mesopotamia,’ i.e. prob. land between Euphrates & Chaboras, so Di after Kiep, Ge 24:10, De 23:5, Ju Jdg 3:8 (cf. Ps 60:2 supr.); cf. ´[[פַּדַּן א]] Paddan-Aram Ge 25:20, Ge 31:18, Ge 33:18, Ge 35:9, Ge 35:26, Ge 46:15, ´[[פַּדֶּ֫נׇה א]] Ge 28:2, Ge 28:5, Ge 28:6, Ge 28:7 v. [[פדן]]; [[דַּמֶּשֶׂק]] ´[[א]] 2Sa 8:6 cf. 1Ch 18:6.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: often indeterminate, esp. in ´[[מֶלֶח א]] etc., perh. primarily land but often including people: so Ju Jdg 2:11, Jdg 10:6 (´[[אֱלֽהֵי א]]) 1Ki 10:29 + 2Ch 1:17 + (41 t. K & Ch) Is 7:1.—(Cf. esp. Nö:Sehenkel BL, ZMG 1871, 113; Hermes v. 3, 443 f. Dl:Pa 257.)
